attributeReference.name: disbVchrPaymentReasonCode
attributeReference.description: The description of the reason for the document Payment. Select one from the pulldown list.

attributeReference.name: disbVchrPayeeIdNumber
attributeReference.description: The unique numeric identifier for the document Payee.

attribute.name: disbursementVoucherPayeeTypeCode
attribute.label: Payee Type
attribute.description: The type of payee for searching. Either of 1) DV Payee: a payee established using the Payee document, or 2) Employee: a payee identified as an employee by information fed into the KFS from some another source.

attributeReference.name: disbVchrPayeePersonName
attributeReference.description: Full name of document Payee, expressed as "Lastname, Firstname Initial"

attributeReference.name: disbVchrPayeeLine2Addr
attributeReference.description: Second address line of Payee, if required.

attributeReference.name: disbVchrPayeeStateCode
attributeReference.description: The 2-character code for the State of the Payee.

attributeReference.name: disbVchrPayeeZipCode
attributeReference.description: The Postal Code for the Address of the Payee. For a US address, this is the numeric ZIP Code assigned by the US Postal Service.

attributeReference.name: disbVchrPayeeCountryCode
attributeReference.description: The name of the Country of the Payee. Select one from the pulldown list.

attributeReference.name: disbVchrRemitPersonName
attributeReference.label: Remit Name
attributeReference.description: The full name of the individual or organization that takes initial receipt of the Payment, expressed as "Lastname, Firstname Initial". Select one from the pulldown list.

attributeReference.name: disbVchrRemitLine1Addr
attributeReference.label: Remit Address 1
attributeReference.description: The first address line of the individual or organization that takes initial receipt of the Payment.

attributeReference.name: disbVchrRemitLine2Addr
attributeReference.label: Remit Address 2
attributeReference.description: The second address line of the individual or organization that takes initial receipt of the Payment, if required.

attributeReference.name: disbVchrRemitCityName
attributeReference.label: Remit City
attributeReference.description: The city of the individual or organization that takes initial receipt of the Payment.

attributeReference.name: disbVchrRemitStateCode
attributeReference.label: Remit State
attributeReference.description: The 2-characode code for the State of the individual or organization that takes initial receipt of the Payment.

attributeReference.name: disbVchrRemitZipCode
attributeReference.label: Remit Postal Code
attributeReference.description: The Postal Code for the Address of the individual or organization that takes initial receipt of the Payment. For a US address, this is the numeric ZIP Code assigned by the US Postal Service.

attributeReference.name: disbVchrRemitCountryCode
attributeReference.label: Remit Country
attributeReference.description: The name of the Country of the individual or organization that takes initial receipt of the Payment. Select one from the pulldown list.
